title: Input Not supported
body:
Out of the blue I get this message. I've played league on this computer before never experienced this.

I went straight to the Game.cfg file and then looked at my resolution settings and changed the res settings back. Every time I save the file the res settings are changed to something else, Idk why. my resolution settings have always been 1366 x 768 and I can't get the file to save this resolution size.

What can I do about this?

replies.body:
Try doing a quick manual config reset to be sure the changes stick.

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\
- Delete the folder named **Config**
- Go into a practice game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings
Try playing in windowed borderless fullscreen. It will automatically set the resolution.
